Class RandomIndexedComic

java.lang.Object
  com.blogspot.applications4android.comicreader.core.ComicParser
      com.blogspot.applications4android.comicreader.core.Comic
          com.blogspot.applications4android.comicreader.comictypes.IndexedComic
              com.blogspot.applications4android.comicreader.comictypes.RandomIndexedComic
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cyanide, TheDevilsPanties
public abstract class RandomIndexedComic
extends IndexedComic

Base class for all those comics which are indexed, but not in order
